attributes.action:
Dental nurses in primary care to be recognised 
as NHS workers for pay/pension
attributes.background: Dental nurses in primary care are employed by dentists who hold contracts with the NHS directly. We therefore are not on a pay banding scale, so not receive any DDR incentives, and are not entitled to NHS pension. We are simply employees working tirelessly for little reward with no recognition

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575494
